about_the_game: I thirty something year old attorney named Charlie, broken hearted from past relationships, is roped in to helping some friends move to a distant city. After a few days of moving, his friends decide a night on the town is much needed after all the hard work. Charlie, feeling melancholy, reluctantly tags along. As the evening winds down, he bumps into a beautiful woman, Allie. She is kind, smart, and wonderful. Charlie and Allie strike up a casual conversation. It is quickly revealed that she is working on her doctorate in city more than a thousand miles to the north. Regardless, the two share a few moments together which causes them to begin to really like each other, but unfortunately, they must part ways early the next morning. Charlie struggles as he deals with the emotion of falling for someone, yet knowing that it will never work out.
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

I thirty something year old attorney named Charlie, broken hearted from past relationships, is roped in to helping some friends move to a distant city. After a few days of moving, his friends decide a night on the town is much needed after all the hard work. Charlie, feeling melancholy, reluctantly tags along. As the evening winds down, he bumps into a beautiful woman, Allie. She is kind, smart, and wonderful. Charlie and Allie strike up a casual conversation. It is quickly revealed that she is working on her doctorate in city more than a thousand miles to the north. Regardless, the two share a few moments together which causes them to begin to really like each other, but unfortunately, they must part ways early the next morning. Charlie struggles as he deals with the emotion of falling for someone, yet knowing that it will never work out.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

short_description: A broken spirited Charlie meets someone who changes his view on life. But destiny keeps telling him this love won't work and that it's too much of a gamble.
